Acura 0-60 times

It feels like you love hitting the gas pedal to the very bottom and put some interest in Acura vehicles. Curious to know what Acura model has the best 0-60 times? For your convenience our team has collected the acceleration data in one place so that you could check out accurate stats on Acura 0-60 times across models and years.

Browse through the variety of Acura models to discover the brand’s vehicles with the best as well as the poorest 0-60 mph performance. You might also want to trace how 0-60 times of a specific Acura model changed across years or compare between different models of the Acura family.

Why is that so important? It is as simple as that. Although official Acura 0-60 times are almost impossible to reach in real world conditions, at least, it is a great indicator of engine’s power. For only 1% of people are interested in this information, you may rightfully be proud of yourself!

The fastest Acura cars

Acura NSX 0-60 2.9 - 4.8 sec 1/4 mile 11.1 @ 130 - 13.2 @ 130 mph
Acura NSX-T 0-60 4.4 - 4.7 sec 1/4 mile 12.7 @ 101 - 13.2 @ 96 mph
Acura TL 0-60 5.4 - 7.5 sec 1/4 mile 13.9 @ 100 - 15.7 @ 93 mph
Acura RLX Sport Hybrid 0-60 5.4 - 5.8 sec 1/4 mile 14 @ 100 - 14.3 @ 84 mph
Acura RL 0-60 5.7 - 7.5 sec 1/4 mile 14.3 @ 94 - 16.7 @ 86 mph
Acura TLX 0-60 5.7 - 7.2 sec 1/4 mile 14.2 @ 103 - 15.6 @ 92 mph
Acura RDX 0-60 5.7 - 6.6 sec 1/4 mile 14.2 @ 98 - 15 @ 91 mph
Acura RLX 0-60 5.8 sec 1/4 mile 14.3 @ 100 - 14.4 @ 100 mph
Acura ZDX 0-60 5.9 sec 1/4 mile 14.4 @ 95 mph
Acura MDX 0-60 5.9 - 7.6 sec 1/4 mile 14.6 @ 97 - 16 @ 87 mph
Acura CL 0-60 6.1 - 7.5 sec 1/4 mile 14.7 @ 98 - 15.7 @ 93 mph
Acura RSX 0-60 6.4 - 7 sec 1/4 mile 14.9 @ 92 - 15.7 @ 86 mph
Acura TSX 0-60 6.6 - 8.5 sec 1/4 mile 14.8 @ 99 - 16.3 @ 89 mph
Acura ILX 0-60 6.6 - 8.3 sec 1/4 mile 15.2 @ 97 - 16.4 @ 87 mph
Acura SLX 0-60 9.8 sec 1/4 mile 17 @ 0 mph
Acura ILX Hybrid 0-60 10.8 sec 1/4 mile 18.2 @ 74 mph
